actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to provide special relief for the payment of Federal income taxes and interest on income attributable to a new home which was won in a radio contest and which was specially designed for the handicapped child of the winner.

summary.text: Provides relief with respect to the imposition of a lien and the payment of Federal income taxes, interest, and penalties attributable to a new home which was won in a radio contest and which was specifically designed to accommodate the handicapped foster child of the winner.

titles.title: A bill to provide special relief for the payment of Federal income taxes and interest on income attributable to a new home which was won in a radio contest and which was specially designed for the handicapped child of the winner.
